text_block_list.text:
One day, while I was having tea 
together with Bubble Gum Fellow――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, did you hear? I heard that a Racing 
Professor is coming from America to give a lecture.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
I have all of his books, you see. Even if it's through an 
interpreter, I'm really looking forward to hearing it in person!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
It seems like it's open to anyone who wants to hear it, 
whether they're a trainer or a student. Are you going too?

text_block_list.name: Student Council A
text_block_list.text:
Haa～……what should I do……everyone I asked today said no. 
If this keeps up, we'll have to cancel the lecture……

text_block_list.name: Student Council B
text_block_list.text:
Either way, we need to find a replacement interpreter! 
We should loosen the criteria and look for more candidates again――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
An interpreter……are you perhaps talking 
about the upcoming special lecture?

text_block_list.name: Student Council A
text_block_list.text:
Eh, ah……that's right. Originally, the professor 
was planning on bringing his own interpreter 
along but, they suddenly had to back out……

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: And, it sounds like you haven't found a replacement, yet.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: ……Then, I'll do it!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. I can speak English, so I'd just need to learn 
the technical terminology. Just leave it to me.

text_block_list.name: Student Council B
text_block_list.text:
B-but……! 
The lecture itself is less than a week away, so I don't think――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
That's more than enough! 
――It'll be fine. I can do it for sure.

From that day on, Bubble Gum Fellow studied hard. 
At the very least, I had to offer what support I could――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: These are all the books in his original language, right?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
It does, doesn't it? But, it'll be fine! I've read all the Japanese 
versions of these books, so I should be able to understand them!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Analyzing the release of different types of 
energy during a race――release as in "conversion"……

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: ――Yeah. I think I'm able to understand the technical terms.

She was studying hard after training today too. 
I prepared something light to help relieve her fatigue.
choice_data_list: Good work, how about a short break?
Good work, how about a short break?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, okay. ……Fufu, it's a bunch of my favorite 
snacks, huh!? Thank you, Trainer-san.
choice_data_list: Will you be ready for the lecture?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Of course. I got an app to help with interpreter 
training recently. I've been able to get some good 
training in with this. ――Just look forward to the day of.
And so, the day of the lecture had arrived.

text_block_list.name: Racing Professor
text_block_list.text:
――Therefore, improving the anaerobic energy
supply system is of utmost importance.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
『Anaerobic energy plays an important role during 
a race. Therefore, improving the anaerobic energy 
supply system is of utmost importance』

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
But that begs the question, how exactly would we enhance 
the anaerobic energy supply system. Let's find out.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Professor, what can we do to improve
our anaerobic energy supply systems?

text_block_list.name: Racing Professor
text_block_list.text:
Hypoxic training, for starters. A simple way
to do this is to use a training mask.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
『Hypoxic training, for starters. A simple way 
to do this is to use a training mask』 This is 
something that we can even do starting tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Attendee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Bubble-san is amazing……! Her interpretation is perfect, 
isn't it……!? She's asking what I want to ask too! It really 
is something we can try starting tomorrow～!

Not only was Bubble Gum Fellow's English translation 
flawless, she was able to ask questions to truly dig 
down in to what the Professor was saying.

The guest lecture ended as a resounding success and 
the attendees learned alot. Bubble Gum Fellow fulfilled 
the role of interpreter as she had promised.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Oh man, I was able to hear a bunch 
of really good things. That was fun～!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: I told you didn't I? I could do it for sure.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
If I'm going to aim higher, then I need to keep 
stepping forward! I was able to learn from the best 
seat in the house. Today was a great experience!

No matter how reckless it may seem, she wanted to 
take the initiative and step forward. ――Seeing her 
like that gave me the courage to move forward too.
